name: retag
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
to mark computer information again so that it can be processed in a particular way: I've retagged your query as non-urgent, but if that's not correct, let me know. In this language database, prepositions are re-tagged "PREP".
More examplesFewer examplesI'm using this app to re-tag all my music on my phone.The inventory must be retagged with the appropriate stock-keeping information.The user has changed the set-up, so the data all needs retagging.
